sentence.Network_en: There was a pause while the barmaid set down two plates in front of us.
sentence.Network_cn: 酒吧女招待在我们面前摆放两个盘子时停顿了一下。

sentence.Network_en: The barmaid had positively refused to draw him any more liquor.
sentence.Network_cn: 酒吧间侍女坚决地拒绝再给他添酒.

sentence.Network_en: I hope to get another situation as barmaid soon.
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望不久就能找到当女侍的地方.

entry.def: A barmaid is a woman who serves drinks behind a bar.
